title: Introducing: Nineteen Ninety Four
body:
British hip hop feels in a pretty good place right now, what with Loyle Carner breaching the mainstream, alongside a plethora of powerful women making colossal inroads both commercially and critically.

London’s **Nineteen Ninety Four**, makes quite the mark on his ambitious debut track, _Butterfly_, merging choppy, almost Kanye-esque beats with a drawl as smooth as anything I’ve heard this year. Purposefully elusive right now, this debut suggests there could be far greater to come from the young rapper. Check it out below.
